channel.title: Rs2 server
channel.description: hi i'm new to this and i'm not really sure where to post this :confused: but i am trying to make my own server and i am using a guide i have found on these fourms. but i dont really understand the first step it says "First off we need a server source (Testscape personally recommended) could anyone please tell me what this means or better send me a link to what i need thanks

item.title: Rs2 server
item.dc:creator: @mattboy mattboy
item.description:
@mattboy wrote:

ok heres a quick guide:

go to:

moparisthebest.com

moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars

and choose any source you would like

Now for people to connect…

no-ip:

go to www.no-ip.com and register an account

then go into add:

and type in whatever hostname you want:

ok… then go into downloads

download it for whatever system you want:

Open it up and it should come up with the server ip you have created

Then Check that box and it should work:

If you Have a wireless router or need to port foward go to:

http://portforward.com/routers.htm

~~~ then find your router type ~~~

Hamachi:

If you would like a hamachi server then go to www.hamachi.cc

and scroll down until u click download

then choose your compute type (i.e. Windows, Mac OSX or Linux)

open up hamachi… go to the box at the side and click, create a new network (make a couple if its a popular server)

make the pass and easy one (recommended is 123)

then at the top it will say a couple of numbers starting with 5.
that is the hamachi ip people will need to connect to ur server!!

Now… when u are all set up, go into your servers files and search for runserver.bat

it will say starting server on 0.0.0.0:43594 note( usually this port)

then open up moparscape and type in whatever username and password you want (this is the ones you will use to connect to ur server)

for YOUR IP you will type in 0.0.0.0 but the others will join the network and out in you no-ip or hamachi ip

~ thanks ~ hope this helped

Read full topic
